backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods implemented.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata describing a deployment-guide feature, including related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for various frontend source files.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide outlining prerequisites and steps for publishing the app to the Internet Computer mainnet.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining a warm amber/orange color palette for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app and Google AdSense script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component managing page navigation and rendering tool pages within the layout.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Layout wrapper providing header, navigation, ad banner sections, and footer around all pages.
frontend/src/components/ImagePreview.tsx: Component showing original and resized images side‑by‑side with dimensions.
frontend/src/components/QrPreview.tsx: Canvas-based renderer that draws a QR code from a boolean matrix.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and managing a backend actor instance tied to the user’s identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Authentication context and hook managing Internet Identity login, logout, and stored identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder hook returning no backend queries since the app is frontend‑only.
frontend/src/lib/image.ts: Provides an async function to resize an image using a canvas and return the resized image as a blob URL.
frontend/src/lib/names.ts: Generates unique random first, last, or full names from predefined lists.
frontend/src/lib/password.ts: Creates secure random passwords based on length and character-type options using crypto-safe randomness.
frontend/src/lib/qr.ts: Builds a simple QR-like boolean matrix with finder and timing patterns and text-based data encoding.
frontend/src/lib/units.ts: Defines unit categories and conversion functions for length, weight, temperature, and volume.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the app root with React, React Query, and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/HubPage.tsx: Displays a grid of tool cards and handles navigation to each utility page.
frontend/src/pages/ImageResizerPage.tsx: Provides UI to upload, resize, preview, and download images with optional aspect ratio locking.
frontend/src/pages/PasswordPage.tsx: Offers UI for generating customizable passwords and copying them to the clipboard.
frontend/src/pages/QrCodePage.tsx: Page that generates a QR matrix from user text, displays a preview, and allows downloading as a PNG.
frontend/src/pages/RandomNamePage.tsx: Page that generates random names based on count and style, with per‑name and bulk copy-to-clipboard actions.
frontend/src/pages/UnitConverterPage.tsx: Unit conversion page that selects categories and units, converts values, and updates output reactively.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, animations, and layout settings, with typography, container queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing implemented tools, features, requirements, and overall app state.
